label: Genesis 1:2
text: "And the earth was formless and void, and darkness was upon the face of the deep: and the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters."
hebrew: וְהָאָרֶץ הָיְתָה תֹהוּ וָבֹהוּ וְחֹשֶׁךְ עַל־פְּנֵי תְהוֹם וְרוּחַ אֱלֹהִים מְרַחֶפֶת עַל־פְּנֵי הַמָּיִם׃
notes: We do not know how long after creation earth was in this state.
